Articles.Content: Just wanted to drop in and say I love KSP!
Well, I'll bet most others here are too! Welcome!
Thanks 3_bit. I find that the KSP world takes up any available free time and is a good way to relax.

It sucks me in every night recently. Such a great piece of software. I recently found a few mods which are inspiring me even more. Some cargo bays from robodyne, the magic smoke industries robotics, the kerbpaint, the b9 aerospace and the ISA MapSat to name but a few.

Don't be afraid of mods, they're awesome.
